channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: The more you make a certain upstate NY congressperson famous for pissing off libs, the more popular you make her with her constituents. Sometimes it's better to just stifle. ;-) https://t.co/8UmRGlo6ot
@mneylon That's good. What registrar? I looked at your profile it wasn't obvious.

For domain registrars everywhere... A feature I'd kill for is a page with a list of all my domains in machine readable form, OPML ideally. How I'd use it: 1. I'd view the page, 2. save it locally and 3. read it into my outliner.
After that, let me submit a page in the same format, of the domains I want to transfer to your site, because this feature makes you king (or queen or non-binary) of the domain registrar world.
Make it easy for me to edit my list locally. Ohhh. I need this. https://t.co/9ojsOOL88l
@dangillmor By any objective measure they have gone. They're in fascist territory.

@AdamSinger @josephskewes they almost never do. i've been around as long as anyone, the apple ii, ibm pc, the web, all the services we use now, none of them were vaporware, ever. they all started gaining awareness when they were ready to use. the mac was the only exception i can think of.

@AdamSinger good way of putting it. i've been dealing with this since i first started shipping commercial software. there's always something wonderful that doesn't exist yet just over the horizon. makes the thing you're shipping now seem mundane. and the ceos of the bigcos always fall for it
@AdamSinger it's been weird watching zuck paddle as hard as he can out to an island that doesn't exist. he used to be a meat and potatoes guy. not an architecture astronaut.
For the Knicks, we set our expectations low, and therefore are not disappointed. This is the equivalent of winning the championship. It's just as gratifying. https://t.co/CZ7PiopvC6
Bitcoin has no future as a payments network, says FTX chief. https://t.co/DtSJvPMVrx

@BearsvilTheater -- good morning. I live near nearby and drive by your place pretty much every day and noticed a large area has been cleared and construction is starting. I was curious to know what you're building? Thanks..
@bloatedlesbian @CelticpeaderB please take me off the cc list. thanks.
@jeffjarvis Mazel tov.
I think Twitch did an amazing job of turning off the live stream of the Buffalo shooter in two minutes. The current governor of NY, Kathy Hochul, says that isn't good enough.
Looking at the front page news this morning the only conclusion is white people suck.
5 new features that make Workflowy a great note-taking tool. https://t.co/YI7q0NqnRa
El Salvador’s President Went All In on Bitcoin. Then It Tanked. https://t.co/9N61IsOido
After Buffalo Shooting Video Spreads, Social Platforms Face Questions. https://t.co/O0fmgeNxL5
The Buffalo Shooter Isn’t a ‘Lone Wolf.’ He’s a Mainstream Republican. https://t.co/imGiFJqFpn
Edward Hopper’s New York. https://t.co/a7HqVxW4Mh
John Fetterman Recovering After Stroke Before His Senate Primary. https://t.co/fJhEHZCm3o
Love how the chiron covers the score readout. https://t.co/dhFIejywU4
The Buffalo shooting video is everywhere and I think everyone should watch it.
@fozbaca You mean push poll not pole.
@lizasperling Hope you had a happy birthday May 2 girl ❤️

I've noticed my Spectrum bill inches up a few dollars every month. Not enough to make a stink about but it adds up. I have StarLink now, but haven't mounted the antenna well enough yet, so I can't turn off Spectrum, yet. ;-)

I don't know what Netflix is planning to do, if it's videos glorifying Hitler than I can't agree with Musk. On the other hand, I've seen privilege at the NYT and elsewhere result in ridiculous chilling, esp the excision of Donald McNeil. https://t.co/GlpmGM6OgL. https://t.co/1f03b9BLfl
